Type.Name: UpdateType

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UpdateType extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Provides a method of indicating how 'updates' should occur.

remarks.para: The purpose of this type is most easily explained in the context of its use. , a base class for slider widgets such as , uses an UpdateType to determine how often to update a text value when the user is dragging a slider bar around.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.UpdateType Continuous = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that updates should occur as soon as possible.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.UpdateType Delayed = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that updates should happen as often as possible, but a delay between an action and its update, is allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.UpdateType Discontinuous = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that updates are not urgent.

remarks.para: This typically indicates that a whole group of updates can be done at once when a user action has finished.
